Title: Silverlight Video CoverFlow
Description: This a Silverlight Sample Application including a Coverflow of Video (streaming)
HomeWiki:
Overview
This project is a sample application to show a CoverFlow Videos.

Details
This application was created with Silverlight composite application based on Prism Framework. The architecture is based on PRISM framework and includes Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) pattern.

Additional Links
